description: A deliciously meaty and savoury take on the classic shepherds pie.
name: Lamb Liver Mini Shepherds Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pan with 1 tablespoon of oil to a medium heat and fry the mince for 10 minutes or until fully cooked. Remove the mince and leave to one side, then fry the liver for 5 minutes.
Once cooked, remove from the heat and leave to one side. Now add the other tablespoon of oil and fry all the vegetables and herbs for 10 minutes while tossing.
Now add the stock and re-introduce the meat, allow to simmer for 30 minutes until the stock reduces. Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced.
Boil the potatoes in a pot of boiling water for 20 minutes until cooked. Once cooked, remove the water, add the butter and milk and mash together.
In a casserole dish, add all the meat and veg to the bottom and then top with the mash. Bake in the oven for 45 minutes and then allow to cool slightly before serving.
